body_html: @zou3519 can I help with this at all? Now that you've done the hard part, I'm happy to resolve merge conflicts and add tests. (We're looking forward to using this in Pyro, and we already have a wrapper to use torch.distributions.Gamma).

body: @zou3519 can I help with this at all? Now that you've done the hard part, I'm happy to resolve merge conflicts and add tests. (We're looking forward to using this in Pyro, and we already have a wrapper to use `torch.distributions.Gamma`).
